name: Bridge Player 3
overview:
Bridge Player 3 is the ultimate refinement in home computer versions of this sophisticated card classic, with exceptionally strong bidding and play of cards. The computer can play as defender or declarer, generates random hands, and allows proper bidding in the ACOL system, including the stayman and blackwood conventions. Then it takes you on, playing both your opponents' hands. Ideal as a tutor for beginners, and will give even highly skilled players an engrossing hand.

Pit your wits against this powerful program.
